DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to examine the safety and efficacy and dose-response relationship of three doses of CP-526,555 for 12 weeks compared with placebo for smoking cessation; including post-treatment follow-up of smoking status to one year from randomization. A small satellite protocol (A3051048) investigated safety of a second course of therapy in subjects who did not quit.
DOC.brief_title: 12 Week Evaluation of the Safety and Efficacy of 3 Doses of CP-526,555 and Placebo for Smoking Cessation
DOC.criteria: Cigarette smokers who are motivated to stop smoking and have smoked an average of at least 10 cigarettes per day Subjects who have used a nicotine replacement product within 30 days of the study screening visit or intend to use it during the study.
